description: Currently run_test doesn't allow stopping immediately on the first failure. It would be nice to have this as a command line flag so the test suite would exit as soon as a test doesn't pass. Backporting failfast from 2.7's unittest may be an option.
title: run_tests should add/allow failfast

comments.content: Currently run_test doesn't allow stopping immediately on the first failure. It would be nice to have this as a command line flag so the test suite would exit as soon as a test doesn't pass. Backporting failfast from 2.7's unittest may be an option.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~jason-koelker

comments.content: Since run_tests actually utilizes nose, just -x, or --stop will do this. I've updated the run_tests.sh usage info to reflect this.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~alex-meade
